short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the price of smartcash crypto in real time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offer the possibility to consult the price of Smartcash cryptocurrency in real time, directly of you browser.
You can too, convert in real time smart to BRL or Smart to USD.

The objective is to facilitate the monitoring of Smartcash prices.
